column5: I had bought a pair of Maui Jim sunglasses last year July and had the nose pads go missing and a minor chip out of one of the lenses. Attended the office in Mississauga and they replaced both the frame and the lenses, so I have a brand new pair of glasses, no sceptical questions asked or receipt shown. I was very impressed by the service that I received from them.
My kid broke a pair of mine in half, and they have me a new pair no questions asked.  Great service!
Great news. For what they cost, they better come thru
They are pretty sweet sunglasses aren't they.  Got mine earlier this year.  Was able to use both mine and my wives work coverage to cover most of the cost.
I've got a pair I bought in the 90's, I broke them two winters ago. Being the cheap skate that I am, I have to wonder if their customer service would be so good as to take care of me as well? HH
Go to their office and ask. Worst they can say is no.
